description:
Jeff Heck is Mansfield's Injury Lawyer. If you live in or near Mansfield, or anywhere in North Central Ohio, The Heck Law Offices, Ltd., is your personal injury law firm of choice. We offer personal attention and effective representation to help you get the injury compensation you deserve, including all kinds of injury cases and medical malpractice.

Fighting For Your Rights

Jeff Heck has been serving North Central Ohio for nearly 30 years. After 15 years as a successful insurance defense attorney, Mr. Heck established a private practice dedicated to fighting for the rights of individuals against the same insurance companies he once defended.

This previous experience provides a significant advantage to his personal injury clients. Attorney Heck understands the inner workings of insurance companies – how they analyze, evaluate, and deny claims – and uses that knowledge to build stronger cases for individual claimants. Jeff Heck is a unique combination of a small-town lawyer with comprehensive, sophisticated experience. Our law firm has taken on complex cases against large insurers and companies. In the End Jeff Heck has been able to win for his clients.

Caring, Reliable Representation

At The Heck Law Offices, Ltd., we understand that an injury or death of a loved one can turn your life upside down. Whether you were injured or have lost a loved one in a car, truck or motorcycle accident – including one caused by drunk or distracted driving – or due to medical malpractice – such as a surgical or emergency room error, or a failure to diagnose – our law firm can help. We offer you peace of mind when you need it most. You can focus on taking care of yourself, because you know that an experienced attorney is taking care of your case.
